titleTwo: Check out some of my recent work
aFarmText: I created a Next.js e-commerce site for an herbal pharmacy, allowing customers to easily find natural remedies for their health needs.
tuzlaTaxiText: I developed a website for a taxi company in Tuzla, optimized for simple online booking and an improved user experience, enhancing the clientâ€™s digital presence.
chessText: Online Chess game that lets players enjoy multiplayer matches with friends and build their friends list.
pokerText: Online Poker game where players can create games, join existing poker rooms, and play real-time multiplayer matches with others.
